Black makes a push to break open the center.  I want to develop before it bursts, since his King is a sitting duck if the center goes and he isn't castled.
I saw this coming.  I want to castle queenside for a big attack on the soon to be open d-file so I let it happen.

! The Knight on f6 protects the d7 square.  Here is a push to remove him.  A simple ...h6 by Black could slow the attack.  But instead...
Threatening a key piece to my invasion.  No worries if I can connect the Rooks...
Another sacrifice to connect the Rooks and continue the attack.  Black can't castle through check, but he should activate his Bishop on f8 and allow for a Kingside castle.  Instead...
